En el día de la independencia de #Cuba, honramos a los valientes hombres y mujeres que luchadores por la libertad y por una Cuba libre de tiranía, represión y socialismo. 1/2 🇨🇺🇺🇸

On Cuba's Independence Day, we honor the many freedom fighters who've courageously fought for a Cuba free of tyranny, repression, & socialism. 1/2 🇨🇺🇺🇸

Hoy al conmemorar el día de la independencia de Cuba, también aplaudimos los 35 años de @martinoticias. Felicitaciones a todo el personal y empleados de la familia Radio y TV Martí. Agradecemos su compromiso con una prensa libre y sin censura en #Cuba.

As we commemorate Cuba's Independence Day, we also applaud the 35th anniversary of @martinoticias. 

Congratulations to all of the staff and employees of the Radio and TV Martí family. We are grateful for your commitment to a free and uncensored media in #Cuba. https://twitter.com/USAGMgov/status/1263088415546933249 QT @USAGMgov Happy 35th anniversary to Radio Martí, USAGM's Spanish-language network promoting freedom & democracy to the people of Cuba with objective news & information. 

Today, we're celebrating their rich history & accomplishments over the past 35 years.    

#35RadioMartiContigo #cuba http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1263088335444217856/pu/img/VvTT8UGIuFr1JIiG.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1263088335444217856/pu/vid/480x270/XESXQ6VuZ872os6L.mp4?tag=10

Congratulations to President @iingwen of #Taiwan on being sworn-in for her second term.  I look forward to working with you to strengthen the U.S.-Taiwan relationship for the years to come. 🇹🇼 🇺🇸 #Taiwan520 https://twitter.com/iingwen/status/1262976750289432577 http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1263144726238236678/pu/img/KobCbJnYcoqNK0MC.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1263144726238236678/pu/vid/480x270/E-QT2Do8Hq5XhYXa.mp4?tag=10 QT @iingwen I am honoured to once again take on the responsibility entrusted to me by the Taiwanese people as President. I know that no matter the challenges we may face, we will stand together in freedom, democracy, & solidarity. Full speech:

The U.S. is proud to stand with #Taiwan, a partnership bound in statute & founded on common interests. I look forward to continuing to work with President Tsai to strengthen this alliance and stand up for our shared values, especially freedom and democracy. https://twitter.com/Reuters/status/1263070232790413314 QT @Reuters Taiwan cannot accept becoming part of China under its 'one country, two systems' offer of autonomy , President Tsai Ing-wen said https://trib.al/TeVTCyF
